tool_description: Generate dynamic UPI QR Code to receive payment from any UPI APP
name: Dynamic UPI QR Code Generator
title: Dynamic UPI QR Code Generator

api_list.name: https://www.omqrc.com
api_list.description: API generate Dynamic  UPI QR Code in the form of PNG image or Base64 image format, depending the output parameter, defined. You can display the image on POS, vending machines or print the image on the bills, so payer can scan the UPI QR Code with UPI APPs to make payment.

required_parameters.name: payee
required_parameters.description:
Receiver of the Payment whose vpa is given.

Note: Replace blank Spaces in the Parameter value with %20

required_parameters.name: vpa
required_parameters.description: BankAccount@IFSCCode, if receiving payment with bank account & IFSC Code, otherwise upiid@upihandle

optional_parameters.name: billno
optional_parameters.description: Bill Number / Order Number / Transaction Referance

optional_parameters.name: paymode
optional_parameters.description: Parameter is required to receive payment with Bank Account No. & IFSC Code. In case you have UPI ID / VPA, then the parameter is not required.
